title: A Field Guide to Cows: How to Identify and Appreciate America's 52 Breeds
description: Always informative, sometimes amazing, often amusing, A Field Guide to Cows features detailed descriptions of 52 cool cow breeds. Each breed description includes a tasteful illustration, invaluable information on the cow's origin and history, and statistics on abundance and popularity. Learn about: the best milking cow, the smallest cow, the longest-horned cow, and many more cows. Also includes: tips on cow watching, scores of cow facts, famous cows in history, and a genuine field-tested cow call.
author: John Pukite
